The Morality Variable

real tech, real choices, fake people

A washed-up scientist faces the consequences and questions her work has raised now that machines are making decisions for people. Inspired by real-life emerging technology, this story introduces how big data and the trolley problem can affect our daily lives. The Morality Variable received an Honorable Mention from the Writers of the Future competition.

Providing feedback on other’s WIP (work in progress) is crucial to reflecting on your own style, contributing to the writing community, and developing as an artist. So—and this might be rich coming from a self-proclaimed savage cabbage—we all should consider how to share critiques without being a tool.
